page.title: 03FINZEAN SHELTERED HOUSING.
page.content: {9 houses + a warden's house}were completed in March 1983 and occupied in May.They are situated near the shop and Post Office, approx.50m off the main road. Accommodation consists of living room, bedroom, bathroom and kitchen, very comfortable with electric central heating, good insulation and double glazing. There is a suite of rooms with twin- bedded bedroom and bathroom for tenant'guests -at a small charge- and a laundry,recreation room and public telephone. The warden,or her deputy,calls at each house every morning and throughout the day for anyone in need of special care:communication cords in every room will summon her.{We are well cared for {yet retain our precious independance.
